data.message: Eh... Sorry, Eminem. You're getting dried up, so you decided to jump on the Trump bashing bandwagon, too.

replies.message: Was he dried up when he went on the Bush bashing bandwagon? Jeez

I could care less about Bush. However, Trump's doing something that should had been handled for years. Look, I like Eminem's music; however, seeing all of the celebrities bash President Trump is pretty pathetic.
get the fuck over it no one cares about your shitty redneck headass opinions gtfo
Did you just start listening to em? I guess he jumped on the Bush band wagon when he was ripping him apart to  stfu if you have no idea what you're even saying
Shut up asshole your dried up prume
The dude bashes shitty Presidents for a living...can't call it bandwagon
Awwww does the poor baby need a diaper change??? 😢😢😢
He has been bashing trump years before he became president. Triggered snowflakes
Coming from nobody with the Hitler stache and combover
Not all shitty presidents Kish Pernel Espirit.  He skipped our last shitty president.   I don't like trump either but Obama was a piece of shit too and not a peep from this sellout fake af rapper
Youd let trump go harvey weinstein on you
Lol, the man ripped on Clinton, bush, Obama but nah man trump hurt my snowflake feelings. Go Drink bleach until your feelings heal.
T.j. Groesbeck to a lot of people Obama was a good one but idk don't really care they are all the same to me
He may have dissed them but never straight up said if you support them fuck you don't listen to me
Michael Sciarrillo you do understand that a snowflake is a slang term for a liberal, right?
Same could be said to you. You're on this fuck Eminem he dissed Trump bandwagon
Brian Beaudoin  he gave obama props despite him turning the Middle East and North Africa into a war ridden shithole. Even though he bashed bush for the same thing, he's a hypocrite.
You’re a crybaby trump supporter nobody is taking your comment seriously. People like you are why the rest of the world doesn’t take your country seriously.
